billingMaintenance.title: Billing information
billingMaintenance.body: Add a payment method and view your current account details.

web.title: Manage your web presence
web.welcomeBody: If a website already exists which details your partnership with Strategic Machines, please enter it below.  Or, Strategic Machines can deploy a new website for you!
web.getNetlify: If you have a site, but prefer to let Strategic Machines take over, remove the URL.  Be advised, once your site is deployed the URL will be overwritten.

netlifyDeploy.templateDisclaimer: Templates are all provided for free from HTML5Up.
netlifyDeploy.selectTemplate: Please select a template you would like to use.
